name: fluttermoji
shortDescription: A light-weight and highly customizable SVG avatar library for Flutter apps. Provides a Customizer Widget, CircleAvatar, theme data and utility functions that are ready-to-use.
longDescription: A light-weight and highly customizable SVG avatar library for Flutter apps. Provides a Customizer Widget, CircleAvatar, theme data and utility functions that are ready-to-use.
